column2: "Na Bezalel dze akeesia dua yɛɛ adaka no: ne tsentsen yɛ bɛyɛ basafa kor nye fa
column3: ne tɛtɛr bɛyɛ anamɔn ebien nye fa
column4: no krɔn bɛyɛ anamɔn ebien nye fa:"

column2: "na ɔdze sika mapa duraa no mu nye n'ekyir
column3: na ɔyɛɛ sika hankra twaa ho hyiae."

column2: "Na oguu no ho sika nkaba anan
column3: dze sisii n'anan anan no ho; nkaba ebien wɔ n'afa kor
column4: na nkaba ebien wɔ n'afa kor so."

column2: "Na ɔdze akeesia dua senseen mpoma
column3: na oduraduraa ho sika."

column2: "Na ɔdze mpoma no hyehyɛɛ nkaba no mu wɔ adaka no ne nkyɛn mu
column3: ma wɔdze aasoa adaka no."

column2: "Na ɔdze sika mapa yɛɛ mbɔbɔrhu egua: ne tsentsen yɛ bɛyɛ basafa kor nye fa
column3: na ne tɛtɛr bɛyɛ anamɔn ebien nye fa."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ sika kerubim ebien; ɔbor edwuma na wɔdze yɛe
column3: wɔ mbɔbɔrhu egua ne tsir ebien no;"

column2: "kerubim kor wɔ ne tsir kor
column3: na kerubim kor wɔ ne tsir kor so: mbɔbɔrhu egua no ne sin kor no ara mu na ɔmaa kerubim no firii wɔ ne tsir ebien no do."

column2: "Na kerubim no tserɛtserɛɛw hɔn ntsaban mu wɔ sor
column3: dze hɔn ntsaban no kataa mbɔbɔrhu egua no do
column4: hɔn enyim dzi abɔenyim; mbɔbɔrhu egua no do na kerubfo no hɔn enyim bedzii."

column2: "Na ɔdze akeesia dua yɛɛ ɔpon no: ne tsentsen yɛ basafa kor
column3: na ne tɛtɛr anamɔn kor na fa
column4: na no krɔn bɛyɛ anamɔn ebien nye fa:"

column2: "na ɔdze sika mapa duraa ho
column3: na ɔyɛɛ ho sika hankra hyiae."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ ho ntotoano a ɔbɛyɛ nsatseama hyiae
column3: na ɔyɛɛ no ntotoano no ho sika hankra hyiae."

column2: "Na oguu no ho sika nkaba anan
column3: na ɔdze nkaba no sisii kutuw anan a ɔwowɔ n'anan anan no ho no do."

column2: "Ntoatoano no nkyɛn papaapa na nkaba no dzii
column3: beebi mbrɛ wɔdze mpoma no bɛhyehyɛ dze asoa ɔpon no."

column2: "Na ɔdze akeesia dua sinsiaan mpoma no
column3: na oduraduraa ho sika

column2: "Na ɔdze sika mapa yɛɛ ɔpon no no do ndzɛmba no
column3: nkwansɛn
column6: nye no nkɔɔpow a wɔdze bohue."

column2: "Na ɔdze sika mapa yɛɛ kandzeadua no: ɔbor edwuma na ɔdze yɛɛ kandzeadua no
column3: n'anan
column4: nye no dua; no ho mpokuwa
column7: fi sin kor no ara mu:"

column2: "na abaw esia fifi ne nkyɛn mu; na kandzeadua no abaw ebiasa fi n'afa kor
column3: na ebiasa fi n'afa kor so."

column2: "Mpokuwa ebiasa a wɔayɛ no dɛ almɔnd nhyiren wɔ abaw kor ho
column3: kukuduuduw nye nhyiren; na mpokuwa ebiasa a wɔayɛ no dɛ almɔnd nhyiren wɔ abaw kor no so ho
column4: kukuduuduw nye nhyiren: dɛmara na ɔtse wɔ abaw esia a efifir kandzeadua no ho no ho."

column2: "Na kandzeadua no ho wɔ mpokuwa anan a wɔayɛ no dɛ almɔnd nhyiren
column3: no nkukuduuduw

column2: "na kukuduuduw hyɛ abaw ebien a otuatua ho no mu biara ase
column3: wɔ abaw esia a efifir mu no ase."

column2: "No nkukuduuduw nye n'abaw no fi sin kor mu ara: ne nyinara sika mapa na wɔdze yɛɛ no ɔbor edwuma kor."
"Na ɔdze sika mapa yɛɛ no ho nkandzea no esuon
column3: nye no ho adabaa no

column2: "Sika mapa kyɛpɛn kor na ɔdze yɛe
column3: nye no ho ndzɛmba no nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔdze akeesia dua yɛɛ eduhuamhyew afɔrmbukyia: ne tsentsen yɛ bɛyɛ anamɔn kor nye fa
column3: na ne tɛtɛr bɛyɛ anamɔn kor nye fa
column4: etwaanan a; na no krɔn yɛ basafa kor; ne mmbɛn so fi sin kor no ara mu."

column2: "Na ɔdze sika mapa duraa ho fi n'etsifi
column3: nye ne nkyɛn nkyɛn hyiae
column4: nye ne mmbɛn no: na ɔyɛɛ ho sika hankra dze hyiae."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ no ho sika nkaba ebien wɔ ne hankra no ase
column3: wɔ ne mparba ebien no do
column4: wɔ ne nkyɛnmu ebien no do
column5: beebi mbrɛ wɔdze mpoma no bɛhyehyɛ dze asoa."

column2: "Na ɔdze akeesia dua senseen mpoma no
column3: na oduraduraa ho sika."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ ɔserango krɔnkrɔn no
column3: nye nduhuanhuam hyewee gyenengyenen no
